about_the_game:
The Creature Feature Volume I


Created by David Cole & Drew "Jinjeet" Philbrick

Bardic Mischief Games

Designed for use with the Shadowdark RPG

"Alright, my groovy goblins and dice-slinging daredevils, let me lay it down for ya--The Creature Feature is where it's at! We're talking a jam-packed setlist of 111 wild and wicked monsters, each decked out with killer details and stats to crank your campaigns up to 11. Picture this: all the freaky fiends I've met on my rock 'n' roll road trips, now headlining in your dungeon. From spine-chilling nightmares to party-starting oddballs, this book's got the perfect beastie to shake things up. So grab your lutes, roll those dice, and let ol' Drewcifer take you on a monster-mash tour of epic proportions. Keep it loud and adventurous!"

150 Monsters and Adversaries with complete statistics for use in your Shadowdark RPG Campaign.


"The Creature Feature is a jam-packed compilation of creatures, monsters, and adversaries brought to life by Bardic Mischief in 2024. This collection blends iconic foes from past adventures with brand-new creations, each meticulously designed to spark imagination and challenge players. From the depths of perilous dungeons to the eerie echoes of gothic horror, these entries promise endless excitement for adventurers and dungeon masters alike. Compiled and narrated by the legendary rock 'n' roll bard Drewcifer Strumwell, this volume combines epic storytelling with monstrous mayhem and a large dose of humor, making it an essential addition to any adventurer's arsenal!"


Artwork created using Midjourney Ai.



"Creature Feature I" is an independent product published under the Shadowdark RPG Third-Party.  License and is not affiliated with The Arcane Library, LLC.

"
